lagrange.utils

Class GeometryUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • lagrange.utils.GeometryUtils

  • public class GeometryUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for determining change in position and distance along a sphere.
    Author:
    Johnathan Kool - modified from code developed by Ashwanth Srinivasan.

      • distance_Sphere

        public static double distance_Sphere(double rlon1,
                     double rlat1,
                     double rlon2,
                     double rlat2)
        Calculates the distance traveled along a sphere (great circle distance)
        Parameters:
        rlon1 - - The longitude of origin
        rlat1 - - The latitude of origin
        rlon2 - - The destination longitude
        rlat2 - - The destination latitude.
        Returns:
        - Distance traveled in meters.

      • distance_Sphere

        public static double distance_Sphere(float rlon1,
                     float rlat1,
                     float rlon2,
                     float rlat2)
        Calculates the distance traveled along a sphere (great circle distance)
        Parameters:
        rlon1 - - The longitude of origin
        rlat1 - - The latitude of origin
        rlon2 - - The destination longitude
        rlat2 - - The destination latitude.
        Returns:
        - Distance traveled in meters.

      • latLon

        public static double[] latLon(double[] coords,
              double dy,
              double dx)
        Executes a change in position within a spherical coordinate system.
        Parameters:
        coords - - Coordinates, latitude first, then longitude
        dy - - Change in the y direction (latitude) in meters
        dx - - Change in the x direction (longitude) in meters
        Returns:
        - The new position, latitude then longitude.

      • latLon

             float dy,
             float dx)
        Executes a change in position within a spherical coordinate system.
        Parameters:
        coords - - Coordinates, latitude first, then longitude
        dy - - Change in the y direction (latitude) in meters
        dx - - Change in the x direction (longitude) in meters
        Returns:
        - The new position, latitude then longitude.

      • latLonZ

        public static double[] latLonZ(double[] coords,
               double dy,
               double dx,
               double dz)
        Executes a change in position within a spherical coordinate system.
        Parameters:
        coords - - Coordinates, latitude first, then longitude
        dy - - Change in the y direction (latitude) in meters
        dx - - Change in the x direction (longitude) in meters
        dz - - Change in the z direction (depth) in meters
        Returns:
        - The new position, latitude then longitude.
